website_summaries.verdict: If you want basic SPF protection with a bit of color, this is a great choice, but it's not intended for a day at the beach.
pros: Blends reparative oil and wax with sugar
Made without parabens, sulfates, synthetic dyes, petrochemicals, phthalates

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $$ vs the cheaper drugstore kinds
customer_reviews.text: I love this lip balm. I may have a slight addiction to trying new lip balms- like if I walk past the aisle I’ll stop and see if there’s anything new. But I felt like i was using all the cheap, drugstore brands constantly. But with the fresh sugar brand I maybe use it once an hour, maybe. Also, when the cold winter comes around I’ve always fought peeling lips and this one keeps it to a bare minimum. Especially if I use fresh sugar’s lip scrub.
customer_reviews.author: A. Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Love love this!
customer_reviews.text: I heard about this on TV, as it had won a top spot in a survey of lip balms (maybe Good Housekeeping?). It's not fragrant, and not sticky at all. It glides on very easily and stays on quite awhile. The best part is the plastic dispenser - the cap twists one way to come off (rather than pulling straight up), and then the balm rises up by twisting the other way. This prevents it from coming apart in your purse, and making a mess! The size is just a bit larger than the usual drug store balms and it is well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Teacher

customer_reviews.title: Breaks too easily
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely product. I like the fact that the container is metal and not one more thing made of plastic. The stuff is super smooth, pleasingly scented, and I really love using it. But. For the price it gets used up WAY to fast, AND it is actually too soft, in that it broke off even though I was being very gentle. Not good. You all know it never really regains strength, right?
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Wellsandt

customer_reviews.title: An expired product!
customer_reviews.text: Despite the fact that this was ordered for Christmas 2019, this product expired a month before it was shipped!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One of my all time favs
customer_reviews.text: Great lip moisturizer. My go to for everyday and even formal events (in the tinted versions). I have extremely dry and chapped lips and this is one of the only lip balms that helps. It lasts until wiped or worn off. My only complaint is that it is not deep penetrating, meaning its only a topical moisturizer and doesn't actually repair my dry lips.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best lip balm but pricey
customer_reviews.text: I love this lip balm. It smells like cocoa. A bit pricey but it is the best I have tried and believe me, I have tried many brands. I got my first one at Sephora, but since the COVID, my nearest Sephora shop have been closed. Glad to find it on Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Len

customer_reviews.title: Very Effective
customer_reviews.text: Of all the types and brands of lip balms/gloss/chapsticks/etc I've tried (and I've tried many, many types), this has been the most effective for lengthy results. The smell is just intoxicating, for starters. I want to eat it! But after a week or two of daily use, my lips were noticeably more moisturized and healthier. I am a person with very chapped lips, even during the summer, so these were a blessing! The rose color was a lovely addition, as well. Not too bold, but subtle and long-lasting. It's worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Bibbles

customer_reviews.title: Great lip balm!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. It tastes good and is very moisturizing for a long time, more than any other lip balm I've ever used.
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Lip Treatment
customer_reviews.text: Luv this lip treatment. It makes my lips so soft. Great in cold weather.
customer_reviews.author: Forever R&R

customer_reviews.title: favorite clear gloss
customer_reviews.text: this leaves a light sheen that fades quickly, while the moisturizing effect lasts - not cheap, but truly worth it
customer_reviews.author: alivefornow

customer_reviews.title: The best lip balm ever
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is the best!! It lasts longer on the lips than any other lip balm. It may cost more, but it's so worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Telford

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love Fresh lip products. This is an exceptional moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: David Mortensen

customer_reviews.title: Best lip moisturizer ever
customer_reviews.text: This moisturizer tastes good and works better than any other I have ever used. I've been using it and all of the other Fresh variations of it for over 10 years. It's also non drying.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Fox

customer_reviews.title: Best Lip Product in Existence.
customer_reviews.text: Undeniably the best lip product anywhere. Smells and tastes great - not sticky or thick. Really the most perfect thing ever made for lips. I don't need lip color so I get the color-less but see they have tinted versions as well. Expensive but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Melisa Singh

customer_reviews.title: Cheating Customers .. Nearly expired ... Less than 1 month usage
customer_reviews.text: This is unacceptable and unprofessional and I will return it .. I bought it in May 2019 and the expiry date is in June 2019 ..
customer_reviews.author: Amira Adouani

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the scent (think lemon pie) and the consistency. Very moisturizing.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: You have to try it
customer_reviews.text: That’s really good... I tried too many diferent products,but this one is the best. It smells too good and very moisturizer
customer_reviews.author: Sona P.

customer_reviews.title: My favorite lip balm.
customer_reviews.text: My favorite night lip balm. So silky, doesn't taste or smell at all.
customer_reviews.author: DVS

customer_reviews.title: A woman's essential
customer_reviews.text: First purchased this several years ago and can't live without it. Great at conditioning and must have in winter.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Gift
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my sister in law for Christmas. She loves it and has already ordered more. Great product and fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: William Elwell

customer_reviews.title: Best Ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is THE most moisturizing lip balm/chapstick I have ever used. Its a bit pricey but totally worth it for me. It can take my lips from super chapped and cracked to soft and luscious overnight!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Great Lip Treatment
customer_reviews.text: My girls love this lip treatment. It is the best....delivery was fast and all went well with that. They received thse as gifts one year and have been ordering them ever since.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Kay

customer_reviews.title: Not for everyone i guess
customer_reviews.text: Okay ive wanted this for the longest. Heard great things about it so when i finally got it i was seriously excited. Im sad to say i was dissapointed. Maybe i got a bad one who knows. But this was nothing special especially for the price and it left my lips with little bumps on them. Almost like a heat rash. It got sticky and i had to keep reapplying it throught the day. Maybe it will work for others but it didn't work for my sensitive dry lips. But thank the lord for aquaphor lip treatment. Cleared everything up in three days and my lips dont feel dry anymore. Even with nothing on them.
customer_reviews.author: Dania Jno-Baptiste

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for years, Expensive, but worth it. Not hard and waxy. Does a good job on winter chapped lips, but I use it year around.
customer_reviews.author: Nana4

customer_reviews.title: This is the best lip balm I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: This is the best lip balm I have ever used. Ever. It is moist but not gooey, and genuinely moisturizes my lips. For those of us in the 50+ age range, good moisturizing products are so important. I also love the light fragrance. A really great product!
customer_reviews.author: CathyT

customer_reviews.title: Your lips will thank you!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this so much I bought several more with tint in them too! I consider myself to have "zombie lips" they crack, they peel and they even bleed. I didn't want anything waxy which just seems to sit on my lips but never soak in. I am a redhead and have very sensitive skin and this never has bothered me once. This is smooth and blissful! My lips thank me every time i use it. The only problem is that it tends to get too soft in ones pocket but as long as you don't mind keeping it in your purse your golden!
customer_reviews.author: Devo

customer_reviews.title: Great lips!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just love this lip balm. The scent is fresh and it is much cheaper than in Canada! Will buy one in every colour!!!
customer_reviews.author: Veromet

customer_reviews.title: the best chapstick
customer_reviews.text: I love this chapstick. At first I scoffed at how expensive it was until i discovered it was the only thing that could save my chapped lips.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Ostrow

customer_reviews.title: This is the best lip balm
customer_reviews.text: This is the best lip balm. I have allergies and very sensitive skin. This is one of the few lip products that I can wear with out any adverse reaction.
customer_reviews.author: Laura D

customer_reviews.title: AVOID: COUNTERFEIT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I received bogus product today. The print on the tubes and the color was lighter, but the main problem was that the product STUNK badly, like formaldehyde. BOGUS PRODUCT!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: globalfruitfy

customer_reviews.title: transformation
customer_reviews.text: A little spendy, but it has transformed my lips from dry and cracked to smooth. I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Virg.

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried every lip treatment option that all brands have to offer. Every one of them results in my lips needing more hydration within 30 minutes. Sugar Lip Treatment gives results from breakfast to lunch...from lunch to dinner...you get the idea.
customer_reviews.author: LaBeanski

customer_reviews.title: Sugar lips
customer_reviews.text: This is the best product I have ever used for chapped lips. The first one was a gift and I have been a loyal customer every since. Would recommend it to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: I've used this item for over 10 years. I love it! I won't use anything else. I would recommend to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Susan Brown

customer_reviews.title: The best.
customer_reviews.text: The is THE BEST lip balm on the market. Yes, it is much more expensive but your lips will thank you. The condition, color and smoothness of my lips has improved 110% since using this product on a regular basis.
customer_reviews.author: Meighan M. Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: The price is a little steep for this product, but I absolutely love this product. It lasts a long time and goes on really smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Shaina

customer_reviews.title: Not as rxpected
customer_reviews.text: I expected more. Probably not any better than Burts Bees which is ok
customer_reviews.author: PH

customer_reviews.title: Good lip treatmemt
customer_reviews.text: The staff is pretty nice and very moisture for lip. It is good to put on this before use lipsticks. However, the product came without the small box for the lip treatment and also the version of the product seems like not be the newest version.
customer_reviews.author: toshi14

customer_reviews.title: Good but too expensive.
customer_reviews.text: A great lip balm and it feels wonderful but not worth the money. Save your money and get Aquafor or blistex.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Used others BUT..
customer_reviews.text: I've used almost all the 'big' cosmetic brands of lip treatments but I've found that this one works while the others are a waste of money. No more peeling, cracking or messy lipstick due to chapped lips. I've learned my lesson and will stick with Sugar lip treatment. I've bought the clear and the tinted so I can apply while out shopping. Lessons for me are learned the hard way but now I'm paying a wee bit more but it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Can’t live without this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I only need to purchase this a few times a year, so the price isn’t as scary. I’m obsessed with this stuff. Leaves my lips moisturized all day and I never feel like I need (or want) to reapply. Totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My lips feel so nice with this product
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift last Christmas and now I cannot live without it so, I purchased more. It is expensive but so worth it. My lips feel so nice with this product. You cannot compare this product to Chapstick or Burts Bees as it is in a high quality league on its own. This will be on my Christmas list for others as well. You cannot not like it.
customer_reviews.author: J Marlatt

customer_reviews.title: Moisture balm
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for moisturizing lip balm that last for hours, this is the one! Pricey but worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: Can't live without it!
customer_reviews.text: I been using it for years and i will keep using it.
customer_reviews.author: ILSA SAAVEDRA-ROGAN

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: For the price I was hoping it would be a little more magical but it does work pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Spalmer

customer_reviews.title: Stuff is fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I first tried this as a sample - this stuff is INCREDIBLE. It has super healing qualities!! If you have smile lines - try it on them at night. You'll be amazed at what this little lip treatment will dog!
customer_reviews.author: F G Keick

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It does not need to be reapplied very often, and it hydrates my lips like no other product. Definitely a staple in my routine.
customer_reviews.author: Ryuzaki

customer_reviews.title: Great for winter lip protection
customer_reviews.text: Been used Sugar Lips for about 4 years. Really think this is a high quality product. It's fairly expense but lasts a long time. Great for winter lip protection.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, but not worth the price. It lasted 1 month and easily melted in my purse when I was outside for a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Hands down my favorite lip moisturizer of all time. Lasts for hours (4-6), not oily and tastes good.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to apply (not waxy like others). Keeps lips moist.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa B

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, but it works!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff really works on dry and cracked lips. It's expensive, but it works!
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this lip treatment. It keeps my lips moisturized much longer than other brands. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Great Lip Protection
customer_reviews.text: This is the only SPF 15 Lip Treatment that I use!
customer_reviews.author: anya

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this lip treatment! Just bought another one for my purse No color Very pleasant scent
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Fishman

customer_reviews.title: REGULAR LIP BALM COSTING 24.00!!! RIP OFF!
customer_reviews.text: I could kick myself for purchasing a lip balm for 24.00 that does the same thing my burts bees does regarding keeping your lips moisturized. This lip balm does not stay on for as long as it states, I have to continue to put it on just like any other lip balm I own and or have owned in the past. My concern is all the great reviews makes me question if they are actually legit. I am not saying that this lip balm totally doesn't do the job, but charging 24.00 is totally a rip off knowing it doesn't do anything more than regular lip balms. I feel like I got robbed.
customer_reviews.author: Deleise

customer_reviews.title: Too costly for what you get
customer_reviews.text: Superior lip treatment, but price was outrageous for a tube of lip treatment. I would buy this forever, if it wasn't so costly. Cost was so high I probably won't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Feedback

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best lip balm I've found, and works well under lipstick or gloss.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My favorite Lip Treatment! It keeps my lips nice and smooth!!
customer_reviews.author: Kat & Dan Paulsen

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I prefer the tinted treatments, especially for the price point. A quality product but a bit over-priced.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I had extremely dry lips. It is so easy to apply this product a couple (or more) times per day, although once or twice is all that is necessary. My lips are smooth and are no longer dry.
customer_reviews.author: Rozanna

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent moisturizer for lips with out being sticky. That said I feel this is overpriced. There are plenty of other balms that work just as well and are reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie's Angel

customer_reviews.title: This really is wonderful to soothe your lips!
customer_reviews.text: My lips were pretty dry and nothing really helped for long, only lasted minutes. This really soothes and makes your lips feel nurtured for long periods. It penetrates and feels amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Aries411

customer_reviews.title: Great Lip Balm
customer_reviews.text: This is the best lip balm I have ever used. It stays on longer and works better.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Not very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why this is so expensive. It is only ok, will. not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: tamara a

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: My friend told me about this lip gloss and I absolutely LOVE it. I own at least 3-4 so I always have one available. Great price and fast shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Grady

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am so sad it appears that the Plum Sugar has been discontinued. Love the texture and tint!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Leigh Haney

customer_reviews.title: sugar lips
customer_reviews.text: My daughter told me about this product. We both think it is the best lip moisturizer we've used. I especially like the screw-on lid.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great lip treatment
customer_reviews.text: Great lip treatment, bought as a gift for a friend because it's her absolute favorite product. A bit pricey in my opinion but it has a nice taste and she raves about it, and judging from other reviews I see many others feel the same way.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is the only product I use on my lips during the winter. It smells and feels good, along with that it keeps my lips from peeling. Better than plain chapstick!
customer_reviews.author: jordyn Smith

customer_reviews.title: or provide a good barrier to protect my lips
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the hearty tag. It was too greasy and didn't moisturize my lips, or provide a good barrier to protect my lips. I did not like the way this felt at all. It was really liquidy
customer_reviews.author: UTStudent

customer_reviews.title: The product you have been looking for
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best under-lipstick product on the market. Texture is excellent, no feathering during the day, lipstick stays on longer and keeps the same moist look all day, no dried out look. Plus no taste. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: RoscoeBoscoe

customer_reviews.title: It's not fake.  The real fresh sugar. Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Because it's clear my guys try to take it from me because it does soften lips longer than any other lip balm. I wish Amazon sold the (Red) one to support research for cure.
customer_reviews.author: SCOOL217

customer_reviews.title: this stuff is great for dry lips and not needed as often as ...
customer_reviews.text: this stuff is great for dry lips and not needed as often as other brands....gave some to my daughter who loves it too.
customer_reviews.author: RDG

customer_reviews.title: This is the best for dry chapped lips both summer and winter
customer_reviews.text: This is the best for dry chapped lips both summer and winter! I love it so much I have one for home and one for my purse and even purchased as Christmas gifts for my daughters!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Rum

customer_reviews.title: Amazing best purchase I've made in a while
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money. This Chapstick will make the dryest lips soft! I recommend this product over any other Chapstick. You will be amazed!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Freitas

customer_reviews.title: It is not a good product for me
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time which is the reason why I'm giving it two stars. It is not a good product for me. I believe it caused me to have a minor allergic reaction and it seemed to dry out my lips the more I used it. I don't really recommend this but just because it didn't work for me doesn't it mean it won't work for you.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa

product_meta.title: Fresh Sugar Lip Treatment SPF 15 Sugar- 0.15 oz, Full Size
product_meta.description: A nourishing, repairing & shielding lip treatment Offers a sheer coverage or buildable color Contains sugar, a natural humectant to prevent moisture loss Blended with nourishing oils & protective waxes Loaded with antioxidant-rich vitamins
feature_bullets: Fresh Sugar Lip Treatment SPF 15 (original clear)
Hydrating treatment that nourishes, protects, and plumps the lips
Has a bright, citrus scent and is FREE of petroleum, mineral oil, and lanolin
NO Parabens - Sulfates - Synthetic Dyes - Petrochemicals - Phthalates - GMOs - Triclosan
